message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $12,000. I'm confident this is a fair starting point for negotiations.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe we can find a price closer to my budget. My counteroffer would be $9,500.
Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer.  I understand your perspective on the price. While $9,500 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $10,750?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I think we can find a mutually beneficial price. My counteroffer would be $10,250.
